member.name: T:MAGES.Analytics.AnalyticsManagedObject
member.summary: An object that is managed by the analytics for collision and transform detection purposes.

member.summary: Gets or sets the movement threshold for registering movements for the object.

member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation threshold for registering rotations for the object.

member.name: P:MAGES.Analytics.AnalyticsManagedObject.ReferenceCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the reference counter for the object.

member.name: P:MAGES.Analytics.AnalyticsManagedObject.Track
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this gameobject will be tracked or not.

member.name: P:MAGES.Analytics.AnalyticsManagedObject.CollisionEntered
member.summary: Gets or sets the event that gets called on collision enter. First arg is the other gameobjects name and the second is the a list with the currenlty active action names.

member.name: P:MAGES.Analytics.AnalyticsManagedObject.CollisionExited
member.summary: Gets or sets the event that gets called on collision exit. First arg is the other gameobjects name and the second is the a list with the currenlty active action names.

member.name: P:MAGES.Analytics.AnalyticsManagedObject.PositionChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets the event that gets called when position has changed. First arg is the gameobjects name and the second is the a list with the currenlty active action names.

member.name: P:MAGES.Analytics.AnalyticsManagedObject.RotationChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets the event that gets called when rotation has changed. First arg is the gameobjects name and the second is the a list with the currenlty active action names.

member.name: P:MAGES.Analytics.AnalyticsManagedObject.FrameUpdated
member.summary: Gets or sets the event that gets called every frame.
